snippet.title: Dark and Bright v1.1 | UPDATE Trailer | RPG Maker VX Ace
snippet.description:
Enjoy this trailer about the new Dark and Bright version 1.1!

This is a story about friendship, depression and the constant evaluation of life. Embark on the journey of four friends and learn about their dark and bright times in life - and yours, too.

Dark and Bright 1.1 has finally been released! The game now receives the update it always deserved. Thanks to the feedback of players over the last year, I was able to improve the game a lot, and well, here it is! Many quality-of-life-improvements could be made to improve your overall game experience. Read about the patchnotes in detail on the Steam announcement: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/652270/view/3023596067373982307 

***BUY DARK AND BRIGHT HERE***
https://store.steampowered.com/app/652270/Dark_and_Bright/
https://rinober.itch.io/dark-and-bright

***VISIT THE WEBSITE***
https://rinobergames.jimdofree.com/

***FOLLOW ME ON SOCIAL MEDIA*** 
https://twitter.com/rinobergames
https://www.instagram.com/rinobergames/
